casebody.data:
RITA PACHECO v. HOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF WILLIMANTIC ET AL. (13918)

Heiman, Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Argued December 4, 1995 decision released January 9, 1996 Gary R. Atkinson, with whom, on the brief, was Anthony J. Palermino, for the appellant (defendant). Jeffrey F. Gostyla, with whom, on the brief, was Edward T. Lynch, Jr., for the appellee (plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
